updates_and_events.title: Mutya Hong Butuan 2025 Screening Update
updates_and_events.description: The local government of Butuan has announced that there will be no screening for Mutya Hong Butuan 2025 today. The next screening is scheduled for next Saturday, March 1.

updates_and_events.title: POSITIVITY 5: Uplifting Expressions, Celebrating Positivity in Arts
updates_and_events.description: In celebration of National Arts Month, a group of talented visual artists is coming together to showcase their creativity and passion through POSITIVITY 5. Join us for the grand opening on February 21, 2025, at 2:00 PM at The Event Center, SM City Butuan. The exhibit will run until March 21, 2025.

updates_and_events.title: Tourism AVP Competition Winners
updates_and_events.description: Congratulations to the winners of the Tourism AVP Competition! Champion: BoomVisuals, Finalists: Team 8600 & FilmTrio, Consolation Prizes: TPR, Metanoia Creators, Ma. Mae Bokingo. Your creative storytelling and cinematic skills truly showcased the beauty of tourism!

updates_and_events.title: Tourism Photo Competition Winners
updates_and_events.description: Congratulations to the winners of the Tourism Photo Competition! Champion: Ian Geovan C. Segovia, Finalists: Ian Geovan C. Segovia & Stephen Dabi Cuartero, Consolation Prizes: Esteven Ordo√±a, Michael S. Licup, Dennis Jose R. Malazarte, Stephen Tulin, Ronel Trujello.
